name: Granular: Mountain
description:
This is a Prototype cut from my game called Granular. This was a test for building out a mountain climbing challenge, inspired by the WeeklyGameJam. 

Best played with a XboxOne Controller 

Shift/select will switch to front cam. 

While in the car, you can turn music on and off with keys 1-4 

Although the build is working - it is still a work in progress and will go through many changes. 

Follow me on Twitter to track the game updates. https://twitter.com/Phant0mSl0th

P.S. don't get out of the car after you have gotten in, or it will crash. As stated above, this is a work in progress.
